valhelsia.chat.discord: Please provide feedback on our Discord server.
valhelsia.jei_information.akashic_tome.t: Lost your starting Akashic Tome? Craft the recipe with eight bookshelves to receive a completely filled tome rather than a blank one.
valhelsia.jei_information.farmers_deligh: Rice can be grown by planting it on dirt that is in shallow water, rather than regular farmland.
valhelsia.jei_information.forbidden_arca: Can be planted on top of Diorite and grown with bone meal.
